00020 #include "logging_imp.h"
00021 #include <stdarg.h>
00022 #include <stdio.h>
00023 #include <strings.h>
00024 #include <cstdlib>
00025 #include <iostream>
00026 #include <sstream>
00027 #include <pthread.h>
00028 #include "streamsink.h"
00029 #include "levelfilter.h"
00030 
00031 #define RDK_LOG_ENV   "RDK_LOG"
00032 #define RDK_LOG_COLOR "RDK_LOG_COLOR"
00033 
00034 pthread_mutex_t logging_mutex;
00035 
00036 namespace Logging {
00037 
00038 void log_message(
00039     int           level,
00040     const string& module,
00041     const string& file,
00042     int           line,
00043     const string& function,
00044     const string& prettyFunction,
00045     const string& message)
00046 {
00047     LogMessage l;
00048         l.level          = level;
00049         l.module         = module;
00050         l.file           = file;
00051         l.line           = line;
00052         l.function       = function;
00053         l.prettyFunction = prettyFunction;
00054         l.message        = message;
00055 
00056     log_message(l);
00057 }
00058 
00059 void log_message(
00060     int           level,
00061     const string& module,
00062     const string& file,
00063     int           line,
00064     const string& function,
00065     const string& prettyFunction,
00066     const char*   printf_format,
00067     ... )
00068 {
00069     #define BUFSIZE 1024
00070     char buf[BUFSIZE+1];
00071 
00072     va_list ap;
00073     va_start(ap, printf_format);    
00074     vsnprintf(buf, BUFSIZE, printf_format, ap);
00075     va_end(ap);
00076 
00077     log_message(level,module,file,line,function,prettyFunction,string(buf));
00078 }
00079 
00080 
00081 typedef std::vector<LogHandler*> Handlers;
00082 Handlers handlers;
00083 
00084 void addLogHandler(LogHandler *h) {
00085     pthread_mutex_lock(&logging_mutex);
00086     handlers.push_back(h); // XXX non thread safe   
00087     pthread_mutex_unlock(&logging_mutex);
00088 }
00089 
00090 void removeLogHandler(LogHandler*) {
00091     // XXX
00092 }
00093 
00094 void log_message(const LogMessage&l) {
00095     static bool first_time = true;
00096     if(first_time) {
00097         pthread_mutex_init(&logging_mutex,NULL);
00098         first_time = false;
00099         /* Using color? */
00100         char * color_env = getenv(RDK_LOG_COLOR);
00101         bool color = NULL!=color_env && atoi(color_env);
00102         LogHandler * sink = new StreamSink(&(std::cerr), color);
00103         /* Getting log level from environment. */       
00104         char * l = getenv(RDK_LOG_ENV);
00105         
00106         LogLevel level =
00107         !l                     ? Logging::Info :
00108         !strcasecmp(l,"trace") ? Logging::Trace :
00109         !strcasecmp(l,"debug") ? Logging::Debug :
00110         !strcasecmp(l,"info" ) ? Logging::Info  :
00111         !strcasecmp(l,"error") ? Logging::Error : Logging::Info;
00112         
00113         LogHandler * filter = new LevelFilter(sink, level, true);
00114         addLogHandler(filter);
00115     }
00116 
00117     pthread_mutex_lock(&logging_mutex);
00118     Handlers::iterator i; // XXX non thread safe
00119     for(i=handlers.begin(); i!=handlers.end(); ++i) {
00120         (*i)->handle(l);
00121     }
00122     pthread_mutex_unlock(&logging_mutex);
00123 }
00124 
00125 } // namespace Logging
